plot: A middle-aged pediatrician finds himself to be out of step with his son, an internist, who wishes his father weren't so old-fashioned.
title: This Might Hurt

plot_en: A middle-aged pediatrician finds himself to be out of step with his son, an internist, who wishes his father weren't so old-fashioned.
